messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Takuya Sawada
messages.msgSnippet: Nothing will beat the traditional Samurai Hakama. Sayanora Mmupton1@cs.com wrote: Hi everyone. I dont write much, but I do some observation. n e ways I was
messages.messageBody:
Nothing will beat the traditional Samurai Hakama.
Sayanora
Mmupton1@... wrote:

Hi everyone. I dont write much, but I do some observation. n e ways I was
looking for hakama on the Internet and I came upon a designer named takuya
sawada. I have never seen anything like his clothes except in anime. there pretty
cool. His clothes are modern variations to old ones. but they are super bitchin.

-MattyBoi

messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone. I dont write much, but I do some observation. n e ways I was
looking for hakama on the Internet and I came upon a designer named takuya
sawada. I have never seen anything like his clothes except in anime. there pretty
cool. His clothes are modern variations to old ones. but they are super bitchin.

-MattyBoi
